title: Divine Stones
paragraph: A very rare and valuable gemstone, only given to players who have proven themselves to be worthy.

dynamicContents.content: Divine Stones is the second universal currency besides {{ light essence # article/currencies/light-essence }}. But unlike light essence, divine stones can't be bought. They can only be earned through playing and winning worlds. Divine stones and light essence are shown in the lobby and both can be used to buy different items in the shop.
